product_name: La Roche-PosayEffaclar Mat Daily Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin
summary: SummaryLa Roche-Posay Effaclar Mat Daily Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin hydrates, minimizes excess oil and improves the look of visible pores with a matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsMattifying face moisturizer for oily skin targets excess oil and reduces the look of visible poresDual-action oil-free face moisturizer helps reduce shine and the appearance of visible pores with Sebulyse technologySmoothes skin texture with lipo-hydroxy acidCreates an excellent base for makeupSoothes oily skin with mineral-rich La-Roche Posay Thermal Spring WaterSuitable for sensitive skinNon-comedogenicDermatologist and allergy testedKey IngredientsSebulyse technology and its dual-target action minimizes excess oil to mattify the skin and visibly tightens poresLipo-hydroxy acid helps refine skin texture while visibly tightening enlarged poresZinc pidolate neutralizes shine in oily skinPerlite and silica help absorb excess oilLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutOilParabensItem 2259844How To UseUse daily as an oily skin face moisturizerAfter thoroughly cleansing skin, apply morning and/or eveningIngredientsAqua/Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Isocetyl Stearate, Alcohol Denat., Silica, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, PEG-100 Stearate, Cocamide Mea, Sarcosine, Glyceryl Stearate, Triethanolamine, Isohexadecane, Perlite, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Pentylene Glycol, Polysorbate 80, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Salicylic Acid, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Use daily as an oily skin face moisturizerAfter thoroughly cleansing skin, apply morning and/or evening

reviews.headline: I'd buy the tinted version
reviews.comments: I ordered this online and unfortunately I chose the wrong product. I thought this one was tinted. I still like the quality of it but it's a bit expensive for moisturizer.

reviews.headline: I great for oily skin
reviews.comments: I repurchased this because it leaves my skin feeling fresh, soft, reduces the appearance of pores and it keeps the shine off my face.

reviews.headline: Very expensive for small amount, but works
reviews.comments: I'm almost 41. Prone to break outs and pretty sensitive skin. A lot of moisturizers break me out so I've just gone without and my skin is suffering. This really works well! It absorbs quickly, not greasy, and hasnt broken me out at all. Its helping the dry patches from the cold winter air/heaters running. My issue is its almost $40 for a pretty small tube. While the tube is travel/storage friendly and I love not having to dip into a jar, the price on this feels excessive for the amount you get. Im going to repurchase because its all my skin seems to tolerate so apprently my skin just has to be bougee. :/

reviews.headline: Best I Have Used So Far
reviews.comments: I've tried different moisturizers before, but after finding this one it's been great for my face, which is on the oily side.

reviews.headline: Love but price could be better
reviews.comments: Over 40 and body is changing due to hormone replacement therapy. I noticed my skin becoming more oily and break outs appering on my face. After reading reviews, i decided to give this moisturizer a try. Im glad i did. So far this has been the only moisturizer  I've found that gives me the hydration I need without my skin becoming oily. For me, a little goes a long way. It does take some time for it to be fully absorbed into my skin and the cost is crazy for something so small but my face seems to like it so I'll be purchasing more.

reviews.headline: AWESOME!
reviews.comments: Just the best that I have used so far!

reviews.headline: Second bottle i buy
reviews.comments: Best leaves skin feeling so soft and doesnt break out my skin

reviews.headline: Luxury Level
reviews.comments: As someone with shiny, oily skin, I have tried my fair share of mattifying moisturizers, including La Roche-Posay's other mattifying moisturizer. This for me, is the absolute best. Yes, the price point is a bit steep, but with skincare sometimes you get what you pay for, and this is definitely one of those times. A little really goes a long way with this lightweight, gel-cream consistency moisturizer so that helps make it a better value. It goes on like a dream, has a delicious light scent (I'm not completely against fragrance myself if it's done right) and actually keeps my skin looking matte and smooth all day. Overall, I really enjoy many La Roche-Posay products, but this, hands down is my favorite. If you're looking for lightweight mattifying hydration, try this one out for yourself.

reviews.headline: not buying any of their moisturizers again
reviews.comments: i do like using this brands face wash for oily skin but this moisturizer made my face break out in little bumps after using.

reviews.headline: Way too expensive for the size!
reviews.comments: I have to buy this because it's the only moisturizer that stays matte in warm weather for me, but it's way overpriced for the amount you get. It's basically a travel size tube for over 3 times the price of the travel size Toleriane Double Repair moisturizer. Why?  La Roche Posay is making a killing on this one. But until I find something else that works for my problem/sensitive skin, I'm a sucker for it.

reviews.headline: Big mistake!
reviews.comments: Never again! Used it once at night and woke up with an itchy burning hives/rash on my face and neck. I'll stick with Skinceuticals and Elta MD.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: Very affordable price and the quality it's great for my oily skin!

reviews.headline: Great Oily Skin Product
reviews.comments: I have tried countless moisturizers and they all make me so greasy. I have very oily, combo skin and this moisturizer is a game changer for me. It has a matte finish and keeps 95% of my oil at bay with minimal break through. My ONLY complaint is that this does pill under alot of products. I don't like using it under makeup at all. On my bare faced gym or errand days, it's perfect. The pilling is the only reason I gave it 4 stars.

reviews.headline: New must have for me.
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this! This has been the only matte moisturizer that ive tried after going through 3 different ones within the past 6 months and it mattifies! Even hours after putting it on. It lasts around 4-5ish hours. Definitely have to reapply if youre working and sweating a lot though. Only con is that it is quite expensive for the amount you get. I do have the other matte moisturizer from LRP and it doesnt work as quite good for me, so this one is the best for matte moisturizers from them! Would have been a 5/5 if not for the price.

reviews.headline: I Wish They Made A Bigger Size
reviews.comments: 4 stars for the size of the bottle. A bit pricy for a small bottle but I do like the product itself. It applies on the skin very smoothly.

reviews.headline: Drowning in oil
reviews.comments: Made my skin extremely oily. I tried using the smallest amount possible to see if i was using too much and i wasn't. Tried it for 3 days to see if it would change, it didnt. I'm having to wipe the excess oil off my face every hour and my skin isn't ever that bad. I love their other products, this one just isn't for me.

reviews.headline: Wonderful product
reviews.comments: I love this product. I use it all year long. It leaves my skin smooth, moisturized, and mattified.

reviews.headline: Not worth the $
reviews.comments: I have very oily skin and really wanted to love this product but it made my face more oily after my make up was completed. It's also very expensive for the amount yoy get. I went back to my Neutrogena Hydro Boost gel cream.

reviews.headline: Overpriced
reviews.comments: Not impressed with this so-called matte finish moisturizer. It does not really give a matte finish, actually on the shiny side and for the price it contains a very small quantity.

reviews.headline: I love this moisturizer but why so small?
reviews.comments: This makes me skin matt even after i put on sunscreen. Im in love with this moisturizer, my new go to. Though, why is the packaging so small! Cant they make a value size, its really recommended. This product doesnt last very long from my experience, maybe im using to much?

faceoff_positive.comments: I TOTALLY disagree with the other review on this product, it works really well with keeping your face from getting oily and shiny. I wash my face with Effaclar Purifying Foaming Gel first and then use this moisturizer and let me tell you after a week there is a big difference. I have rosacea and very sensitive skin and this stuff is so gentle and has improved my skin in a week of using it in the morning and at night after first washing my face with the purifying gel.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for ache prone sensitive skin!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I've known LaRoche Posay for awhile & was hoping this was effective in dealing with my oily / combination skin.  But, my face got oily after a few hours of using.  Returning it & not buying it again.  Seems the only thing that works for me is oil control moisturizer by Mario Badescu.
faceoff_negative.headline: Face still oily

rollup.name: Effaclar Mat Daily Face Moisturizer for Oily Skin
